mapper.update: update supplier set suname = #{suname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suphone = #{suphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, susheng = #{susheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sushi = #{sushi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suqu = #{suqu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sulxr = #{sulxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sulxrphone = #{sulxrphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suqq = #{suqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suwx = #{suwx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suemail = #{suemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sufax = #{sufax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where suid = #{suid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select suid, suname, suphone, susheng, sushi, suqu, sulxr, sulxrphone, suqq, suwx, suemail, sufax from supplier where suid = #{suid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select suid, suname, suphone, susheng, sushi, suqu, sulxr, sulxrphone, suqq, suwx, suemail, sufax from supplier
